1adc970c-d433-44d0-aa09-d3834986f7a2.Statement: there is a 13.2% difference between the results from the two the primary trial cohorts
1adc970c-d433-44d0-aa09-d3834986f7a2.Label: Contradiction

6b9162d0-0816-46d4-81af-c60028dcc63b.Statement: Patients with significantly elevated ejection fraction are excluded from the primary trial, but can still be eligible for the secondary trial if they are 55 years of age or over
6b9162d0-0816-46d4-81af-c60028dcc63b.Label: Contradiction

0b6cc8e3-69ee-4a91-b93d-2ad3fddce65f.Statement: a significant number of the participants in the secondary trial and the primary trial suffered from Enterocolitis
0b6cc8e3-69ee-4a91-b93d-2ad3fddce65f.Label: Contradiction

cc1f712a-2116-4e40-9810-f315e3fa5ff8.Statement: the primary trial does not report the PFS or objective response rate of its patient cohort
cc1f712a-2116-4e40-9810-f315e3fa5ff8.Label: Entailment

904061c0-14fa-4f13-9118-9a41e24fa8eb.Statement: Prior treatment with fulvestrant or with a phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K) inhibitor will not prevent a patient from participating in the primary trial
904061c0-14fa-4f13-9118-9a41e24fa8eb.Label: Contradiction

43ee7645-ce1e-42d5-9a74-3e379f6f367b.Statement: only patients with a HER2-positive status can take part in the primary trial
43ee7645-ce1e-42d5-9a74-3e379f6f367b.Label: Contradiction

0cef8c8e-7986-46c7-a597-c5733a9899c0.Statement: the shortest PFS in cohort 1 of the primary trial was under 7 months, in cohort 2 the shortest was just over 7 months
0cef8c8e-7986-46c7-a597-c5733a9899c0.Label: Contradiction

43ce26e5-03fa-4e9d-b0eb-6ea356295753.Statement: Both cohorts of the primary trial undergo a total of 17 cycles, each lasting 3 weeks .
43ce26e5-03fa-4e9d-b0eb-6ea356295753.Label: Entailment

3facad41-0221-42f8-834d-470e65c4aad5.Statement: the outcome measurement of the primary trial is The length of time during and after the treatment that a patient survives with the disease
3facad41-0221-42f8-834d-470e65c4aad5.Label: Contradiction

9cbc00e9-3a2d-4471-a93e-72c95132fb6a.Statement: The only case of congestive heart failure in the primary trial occurred in cohort 1
9cbc00e9-3a2d-4471-a93e-72c95132fb6a.Label: Entailment

8b91cab9-d858-45f3-bf8d-3d6fc55b4818.Statement: The the primary trial results section reports two different measurements
8b91cab9-d858-45f3-bf8d-3d6fc55b4818.Label: Entailment

4a75574c-fa86-4e62-a210-81c7b98a3807.Statement: T4 N2 M4 patients are eligible for the primary trial
4a75574c-fa86-4e62-a210-81c7b98a3807.Label: Contradiction

d0b50aeb-aad8-4a8d-aae6-5c58a7d382c7.Statement: The the primary trial results section reports two different measurements, for all 3 cohorts.
d0b50aeb-aad8-4a8d-aae6-5c58a7d382c7.Label: Contradiction

b0b61978-57db-4a1c-812c-509e8b05f2dc.Statement: both cohorts of the primary trial receive identical interventions, the difference between the two cohorts is the types of cancer that the patients have
b0b61978-57db-4a1c-812c-509e8b05f2dc.Label: Entailment

24b85b44-b9e6-4c28-b3aa-1bd97102b7f1.Statement: Patients must have a palpable carcinoma to be included in the primary trial
24b85b44-b9e6-4c28-b3aa-1bd97102b7f1.Label: Entailment

fbb62216-2cf2-4813-ad41-12a86940610f.Statement: Anaemia was the most common adverse event in cohort 1 and 2 of the primary trial
fbb62216-2cf2-4813-ad41-12a86940610f.Label: Entailment

961a956e-fece-4baa-a2ad-d3a5320bd9d2.Statement: The shortest PFS in cohort 1 of the primary trial was less than 3 weeks
961a956e-fece-4baa-a2ad-d3a5320bd9d2.Label: Contradiction

97fd111c-6969-43ab-93af-b3dff09960e5.Statement: The adverse events section in the primary trial is reports the incidence rate of 12 different Aes
97fd111c-6969-43ab-93af-b3dff09960e5.Label: Contradiction

eb1bfb08-eba0-4130-b328-00f56c0f84a6.Statement: Diarrhoea is the most common adverse event in the primary trial and the secondary trial
eb1bfb08-eba0-4130-b328-00f56c0f84a6.Label: Contradiction

b1219e71-fbf5-4bba-8a93-a27ae444e3e1.Statement: to be eligible for the primary trial patients must be diagnosed with hormone receptor positive advanced breast cancer, but can not have received any previous treatment for this advanced cancer
b1219e71-fbf5-4bba-8a93-a27ae444e3e1.Label: Entailment
